price: 6. ¡Y cuántos profetas enviamos a las generaciones que os precedieron!
arabic: وَكَمۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا مِن نَّبِيّٖ فِي ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wakam arsalnā min nabiyyin fī al-awalīna
